segments.text: So , have you seen all three The Lord of the Rings movies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I didn't really like the third one at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's the Return of the King , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . Even though the customs were brilliant , I didn't think it was as good as the first two . What did you think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought the special effects were amazing , but I got a bit confused . The plot was too complicated for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you read the books before you watched the movies ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I've read them many times . I think it's much easier to follow for people who were already familiar with all the characters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , trying to keep track of all the characters was quite confusing for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I also think that it was much better in the theatre than at home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Most movies are . Another problem for me was the film was dubbed in German with English subtitles .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That happens a lot in non-English speaking countries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I heard that The Return of the King was nominated for 11 Oscars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , they not only had 11 nominations , but they won 11 Oscars , too !
segments.speaker: S2
